Restart.title: Restart Device
Restart.desc: Restart the device. Save your changes, otherwise they will be lost.
Restart.confirm: Restart the device now? - all unsaved changes will be lost!
Restart.waitmsg: Please wait while the device is restarting...

Reset.title: Factory Reset
Reset.desc: All settings will be dropped, the device will reboot with factory settings.
Reset.confirm: Are you sure you want to reset the device to factory defaults? The device will restart in delivery state.
Reset.waitmsg: Please wait while the device is resetting to factory defaults...
